ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvrraddi.1 | |- B e. CC |
| 2 |  | mvrraddi.2 | |- C e. CC |
| 3 |  | mvrraddi.3 | |- A = ( B + C ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( A - C ) = ( ( B + C ) - C ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_pncan3oi | |- ( ( B + C ) - C ) = B |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqtri | |- ( A - C ) = B |
